Hello all,

Ouchi Sadatsuna was a vassal of Date Masamune, but he deserted =
him in 
1584.  Masamune led a punitive campaign against him and captured hi=
s 
castle, while Ouchi fled to the Hatakeyama.  He then fought against the =

Date at Hitotoribashi.

However, in 1589 he is seen again, but this time f=
ighting for the Date 
at Suriagehara.  

Does anyone know when and why Masa=
mune accepted Ouchi back into his 
service?

Brian
